name: Padron - Black - Natural - No. 52
additionalNotes:
With over fifty-six years to create a perfect cigar and more than 100 years to create a perfect legacy, the Padrón Family understands the significance of time. They deliver only the finest, hand crafted cigars with the flavor of the Cuban heritage out of which the Padrón recipe was born. Their primary 
Padrón’s reputation dates back to 1964 and today the brand is recognized for an elegant portfolio of premium, handcrafted, aged Nicaraguan blends. Rich flavors and perfect construction continue to keep fans of Padrón cigars readily engaged with a classic profile that speaks for itself.
